DOC.brief_summary: The principal goal of this study was to assess the feasibility of plasma glucose testing in private dental practice. A second aim was was to assess prevalence of plasma glucose abnormalities in dental patients seen by (DPBRN) practitioner-investigators.
DOC.brief_title: DPBRN Blood Sugar Testing in Dental Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The specific aims of this study were: 1. To quantify the percentage of (DPBRN) patients who meet the American Diabetes Association screening criteria and to describe the characteristics of these patients. 2. To quantify the acceptability of conducting glucose testing in the dental office and barriers to regular screening, as reported by (DPBRN) patients and practices.
DOC.criteria: adults over the age of 19 who were scheduled for a visit with an exam patients undergoing continuing treatment where an exam was not part of the visit were not eligible
